Header.title: Welcome
Header.paragraph: "Learning another language is like becoming another person" - Haruki Murakami. We work on Neural Machine Translations.

About.paragraph: UrduX main objective is to democratize access to AI, disrupting traditional business methods by enhancing their impact on a larger scale. UrduX aims to empower communities and businesses to develop multilingual AI-driven solutions for text, audio, images, and videos. We envision a world where language is not a barrier.

Services.name: Thesis Revolution: Breaking Gender Barriers
Services.text: Project by Shahryar Akbar Supervised by Dr. Mehreen Alam where we've tackled gender bias in AI-generated images!

Services.name: Legal Bot
Services.text: Pakistan's Legal Family QA System! This chat system, fine-tuned on the LLaMA 2 chat model, aims to make family law more accessible to everyone. In this video, you'll see how effortlessly the system handles different prompts, providing clear, accurate answers. This tool represents a significant step forward in using AI to bridge the gap in legal assistance.

Services.name: Herd Help
Services.text: Introducing our MVP, HerdHelp, designed to support local livestock farmers in Pakistan with AI-driven insights and assistance. Huge thanks to our supervisor Mehreen Alam, and our amazing team members Ahmed Warraich, Ahmad Munir and Muhammad Usman for their dedication and hard work. Check out the demo to see how we're revolutionizing livestock management!

Services.name: Tech Tutor
Services.text: We've harnessed the power of STT, LLM, TTS and innovative lip synching technologies to create an innovative learning platform that adapts to each individual's needs.

Services.name: DubLingo
Services.text: Breaking Boundaries with " DubLingo ": Experience the seamless transition of an Urdu Video into English and Arabic.

Services.name: AI: The Power of Prompt-Tuning
Services.text: Managing unstructured data can be daunting. That's where "vector embeddings" come into play, making data more manageable. While prompt-tuning can seem complex, vendors are working on user-friendly solutions. Having data science expertise helps.

Features.title: Urdu Chat Bot
Features.text: One of our project is Urdu chatbot that can engage with users and have chat with them related general knowledge of Pakistan

Features.title: Video Translation
Features.text: Breaking Boundaries with " DubLingo ": Experience the seamless transition of an Urdu Video into English and Arabic.

Features.title: Urdu Embedding Evaluation
Features.text: Our project to evaluate the embeddings created for Urdu and Roman Urdu

Features.title: UrduSiri
Features.text: One of our project was Urdu Siri which worked for desktop system applications. Managing that in Urdu was full filling the gap in research market.
